CustomField.description: The date that the 10 digit telephone number was placed into its ported state. This field will be blank when the Portability Status Indicator Code is "0" indicating that the 10 digit phone number is not currently ported.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date that the 10 digit telephone number was placed into its ported state. If the number is not ported, this field is blank.
CustomField.label: Portability Date
